timeline.message:
Fixes based on review

- removed InternalErrorException in getOwnerByName definition and javadoc
- added thrown exception to javadoc of removeHostByHostname

Added getOwnerByName to OwnerManager

- getOwnerByName was added to all layers
- also added tests

Added method removeHostByHostname to FacilitiesManager

- new method removeHostByHostname removes host by given hostname if there is unique host to be removed after privilege check, otherwise throws exception
- also added tests

Updated methods in FacilitiesManagerMethod to work with facilityName

- methods in rpc FacilitiesManagerMethod were extended to work with facility name where previously only facility id was allowed
- addOwner, removeOwner were also extended to work with owner name and not just owner id
- removeHostByHostname added to rpc to simulate removeHost with hostname as parameter
- methods also added to openapi
